hadiths.text: Safiyyah, daughter of Shaybah, said that Aisha mentioned the women of Ansar, praised them and said good words about them. She then said:When Surat an-Nur came down, they took the curtains, tore them and made head covers (veils) of them

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي قَوْلِهِ تَعَالَى { يُدْنِينَ عَلَيْهِنَّ مِنْ جَلاَبِيبِهِنَّ }
chapter.eng-name: The Statement Of Allah, Most High: Draw Their Jilbabs (Cloaks) All Over Their Bodies
